articles.content:
Film Shows Held 
    Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Shows of films on the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader  Kim Jong Il in their revolutionary activities are successfully going on at the cinema houses and cultural halls in Pyongyang and local areas of the country on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 58th anniversary of the WPK and the 77th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
 Shown there are documentary films "The Great Guidance Provided to lead Our Party to Win One Victory after Another", "Brilliant History of Great Leadership" and "Under the Leadership of Great Illustrious Commander" (Serials).    
 Also screened are feature films dealing with the proud history of the building of the revolutionary Party including "A Summer at Hwasong Uisuk School" (Part One and Two), "In Those Unforgettable Days," "The First Party Commissioner" and "Guarantee" (Part One and Two.)
